import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { Task } from '../models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-createtodo', templateUrl: './createtodo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./createtodo.component.css'] }) export class CreatetodoComponent implements OnInit{ tasksForm!: FormGroup submitForm() { const task: Task = this.tasksForm.value } invalidField(ctrlName: string): boolean { return !!(this.tasksForm.get(ctrlName)?.invalid) } ngOnInit() { } }
